resources.string: Touch screen to get the one-handed mode that best suits you
Hold your phone with one hand Stretch your thumb to draw an arc
Put your thumb on the screen and draw an arc
One-handed mode that best fit your hand

%1$s has been be shielded by One-handed mode. In this %1$s Page, if you want to start the One-handed mode, you must enter the Settings-More Features-One-handed mode-Shidld One-handed apps to modify the settings.
